greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Determinant of the n X n matrix M_(i,j)=i/gcd(i,j)=lcm(i,j)/j.
comment: Determinant of a symmetric polynomial evaluated at x = 1 that starts:
formula: a(n+1)/a(n) = A023900(n+1) the reciprocity balance of n+1.
mathematica: Clear[nn, t, n, k, M, x]; nnn = 27; a = Range[nnn]*0; Do[nn = ii; t[n_, 1] = 1; t[1, k_] = 1; t[n_, k_] := t[n, k] = If[n < k, If[And[n > 1, k > 1], x - Sum[t[k - i, n], {i, 1, n - 1}], 0], If[And[n > 1, k > 1], x - Sum[t[n - i, k], {i, 1, k - 1}], 0]];  x = 1;  M = Table[Table[t[n, k], {k, 1, nn}], {n, 1, nn}];  a[[ii]] = Det[M], {ii, 1, nnn}]; a (* _Mats Granvik_, Jul 22 2012 *)
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Aug 19 2003
